content: Meanwhile, the crowds grew until thousands were milling about and stepping on each other. Jesus turned first to his disciples and warned them,
Then someone called from the crowd, “Teacher, please tell my brother to divide our father’s estate with me.”
Then he told them a story:
Then, turning to his disciples, Jesus said,
Be Ready for the Lord’s Coming
Peter asked, “Lord, is that illustration just for us or for everyone?”
Then Jesus turned to the crowd and said,
